snippet: Researchers used highly sophisticated sensors to map Old Sarum, an 11th-century town near Stonehenge.
abstract: British researchers have produced a detailed plan of 11th-century town of Old Sarum, located near Stonehenge, using highly sophisticated sensors instead of digging.
lead_paragraph: Researchers used highly sophisticated sensors to map Old Sarum, an 11th-century town near Stonehenge.

headline.main: Shovels Untouched, Archaeologists Survey a Medieval Town in Britain
headline.print_headline: Shovels Untouched, Archaeologists Survey a Medieval Town in Britain
